TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent

summary.span: 定义承载有关 Web 请求错误信息的事件。

span.span: Defines the event that carries information about Web-request errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 Web 请求过程中发生错误，则会引发。The is raised if an error occurs during a Web request. 应用程序应使用此事件来获取和类定义的请求相关信息 。Your application should use this event to obtain request-related information as defined by the and the classes. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将使用标准 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型并通过设置配置节来控制它们的行为 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以创建自定义类型，如下面的示例中所示。You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example. 如果创建自定义事件类型，并且需要添加自己的信息，请自定义 方法，这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the method, this will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一部分是配置文件的摘录，使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件。The first part is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event. 第二部分演示如何从 类派生以创建自定义事件。The second part shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent/CS/webrequesterrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent/VB/webrequesterrorevent.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview
